actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Laid on Table in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 228 - 170 (Record Vote No: 223).

official_title: A resolution to return to the Senate the bill, H.R. 4961, together with the amendments of the Senate thereto.

summary.text: Returns to the Senate the bill, H.R. 4961 (Miscellaneous changes in tax laws), together with the amendments of the Senate thereto.

titles.title: A resolution to return to the Senate the bill, H.R. 4961, together with the amendments of the Senate thereto.
